tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE protocol_upgrades (
    upgrade_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    upgrade_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    upgrade_version INT NOT NULL,
    upgrade_date DATE NOT NULL,
    upgrade_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE protocol_changes (
    change_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    change_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    change_date DATE NOT NULL,
    upgrade_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (upgrade_id) REFERENCES protocol_upgrades(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Compliance_Records (
   id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   policy_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
   implemented_date DATE NOT NULL,
   approval_person VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE protocol_upgrade_history (
  upgrade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  upgrade_version INT NOT NULL,
  upgrade_date DATE NOT NULL,
  upgrade_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE protocol_changes (
  change_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  change_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  change_description TEXT,
  change_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  record_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  record_date DATE NOT NULL,
  record_details JSON
)

CREATE TABLE version_control (
  version_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  version_number VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  version_date DATE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE ProtocolVersions (
  ProtocolID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  Version INT NOT NULL,
  Description TEXT,
  UpgradeDate DATE
)

CREATE TABLE UpgradeLogs (
  LogID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ProtocolID INT REFERENCES ProtocolVersions(ProtocolID),
  UpgradeType VARCHAR(50),
  LogDetails TEXT,
  LogTimestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ComplianceRecords (
  RecordID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ProtocolID INT REFERENCES ProtocolVersions(ProtocolID),
  ComplianceStatus VARCHAR(20),
  ComplianceDate DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ChangeRequests (
  RequestID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  RequesterName VARCHAR(50),
  ProtocolID INT REFERENCES ProtocolVersions(ProtocolID),
  RequestDate DATE,
  RequestDetails TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ApprovalLogs (
  ApprovalID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  RequestID INT REFERENCES ChangeRequests(RequestID),
  ApproverName VARCHAR(50),
  ApprovalDate DATE
)
